news.title: Reform prepared to deport 600,000 under migration plans
news.summary: The party outlines its plans to detain and deport all migrants who arrive in the UK on small boats.

news.title: How deliverable is Reform's plan on migration?
news.summary: A Reform government could see the UK leaving the European Convention on Human Rights to deliver its plan.

news.title: Tributes paid to three helicopter crash victims
news.summary: Justyna Czoska, Wojtek Kowalkowski and Simon Hewitt died in the crash on the Isle of Wight.

news.title: Ukraine admits Russia has entered key region of Dnipropetrovsk
news.summary: Military says Russian advance "is the first attack of such a large scale" in industrial province.

news.title: UN demands justice over Israeli double strike on Gaza hospital
news.summary: An initial Israeli military report says the attack targeted a "Hamas camera" and identified "gaps" for further investigation.

news.title: Artwork looted by Nazis 80 years ago spotted in estate agent ad
news.summary: Portrait of a Lady seen in house near Buenos Aires, more than 80 years after it was looted from a Jewish art dealer in Amsterdam.

news.title: Cook to sue Trump over order to fire her from Federal Reserve
news.summary: The central bank governor says the US president "has no authority to do so" in defiance of Trump's escalatory move against the Fed.

news.title: No investigation into 'cash for questions' former minister
news.summary: Claims emerged that a company that he worked for helped him write questions to government in June.

news.title: In The Style founder has 'no regrets' about leaving company
news.summary: The company's founder gave a wide-ranging interview about its rise and fall.

news.title: Man told girls in Epping he wanted to 'have a baby', court hears
news.summary: Hadush Kebatu, an asylum seeker staying at The Bell Hotel in Epping, denies five charges against him.
